notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: The work presented in this paper was a collaboration of all authors. F.X. and T.M. researched the principle and theoretical basis of acceleration-induced effects; F.X. analyzed the acceleration-induced effects on the quartz crystal by ANSYS; F.X., designed and performed the acceleration-induced effects experiment system; F.X. modeled the experimental data and designed the digital compensation filter for acceleration-induced effects. F.X. wrote the paper, which was read and discussed by all authors.
